Laymen Called to Public Temperance Work.--A working church is a living church. Church members, let the light 
                                                                           244
shine forth. Let your voices be heard in humble prayer, in witness against the intemperance, the folly, and the amusements of this world, and in the proclamation of the truth for this time. Your voice, your influence, your time,--all these are gifts from God, and are to be used in winning souls to Christ. Visit your neighbors, and show an interest in the salvation of their souls.--Medical Ministry, page 332.
